forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms. Cloudy. High near 86, with temperatures falling to around 78 in the afternoon. West wind around 12 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph. Chance of precipitation is 90%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms. Cloudy. Low around 58, with temperatures rising to around 60 overnight. North northeast wind 5 to 9 mph. Chance of precipitation is 90%. New rainfall amounts between 1 and 2 inches possible.

forecast.name: Thursday
forecast.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms before 2pm, then a slight chance of rain between 2pm and 5pm. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 69. Northeast wind 6 to 9 mph. Chance of precipitation is 90%. New rainfall amounts between three quarters and one inch possible.

forecast.name: Thursday Night
forecast.detailedForecast: Haze before 5am. Partly cloudy, with a low around 53. North northeast wind 3 to 8 mph.

forecast.name: This Afternoon

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
